results.title: Loss of the Drosophila branched-chain alpha-ketoacid dehydrogenase complex results in neuronal dysfunction
results.text_hl: Based on observations in functional rescues with toxic alleviation during the developmental period, our results support the hypothesis that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ could offer a potential @<m>DISEASE_Maple_Syrup_Urine_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008375 @@@MSUD@@@ treatment opportunity (Fig. 6), as currently there is no effective drug invention for @<m>DISEASE_Maple_Syrup_Urine_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008375 @@@MSUD@@@.

citations.NLM: Tsai HY, Wu SC, Li JC, Chen YM, Chan CC, Chen CH. Loss of the Drosophila branched-chain alpha-ketoacid dehydrogenase complex results in neuronal dysfunction Dis Model Mech. 2020 Aug 27;13(8):. PMID: 32680850

results.title: Loss of the Drosophila branched-chain alpha-keto acid dehydrogenase complex (BCKDH) results in neuronal dysfunction.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Maple_Syrup_Urine_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008375 @@@Maple syrup urine disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Maple_Syrup_Urine_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008375 @@@MSUD@@@) is an @DISEASE_Genetic_Diseases_Inborn @DISEASE_MESH:D030342 @@@inherited error@@@ in the metabolism of @CHEMICAL_Amino_Acids_Branched_Chain @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000597 @@@branched-chain amino acids@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Amino_Acids_Branched_Chain @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000597 @@@BCAAs@@@) caused by a severe @<m>DISEASE_Maple_Syrup_Urine_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008375 @@@deficiency of the branched chain keto-acid dehydrogenase@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Maple_Syrup_Urine_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008375 @@@BCKDH@@@) enzyme, which ultimately leads to @DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Tsai HY, Wu SC, Li JC, Chen YM, Chan CC, Chen CH. Loss of the Drosophila branched-chain alpha-keto acid dehydrogenase complex (BCKDH) results in neuronal dysfunction. Dis Model Mech. 2020 Jan 1;():. PMID: 34005114

results.title: Metformin inhibits Branched Chain Amino Acid (BCAA) derived ketoacidosis and promotes metabolic homeostasis in MSUD
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibits KIC accumulation and promotes metabolic homeostasis in @<m>DISEASE_Maple_Syrup_Urine_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008375 @@@iMSUD@@@ mice
